definition: to herd/to breed livestock/to govern (old)/government official (old)

sentences.english: On October 12 two sick children arrived at the hospital in a vehicle from a nomad encampment.
sentences.chinese: 在10月12日有两名患病儿童从牧区乘车来到医院。

sentences.english: In peat pasture areas these emissions are particularly prevalent.
sentences.chinese: 在草炭牧区这些排放尤其普遍。

sentences.english: Farmers may want to put up electric fences to inclose enclose grazing areas, called productspaddocks.
sentences.chinese: 牧民可能想要电篱笆以围住放牧区，这叫围场。

sentences.english: Farmers may want to put up electric fences to enclose grazing areas, called paddocks.
sentences.chinese: 农民可能想要围绕放牧区建起电围栏，也叫做围场。

sentences.english: Education of pastoral areas is an important component of the ethnic education in ABa Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 牧区教育是阿坝州民族教育的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: I can take up to four people in my car.
sentences.chinese: 牧民可能想要电篱笆以围住放牧区。

sentences.english: When she first came to this pastoral area, she found life here a bit difficult to get used to.
sentences.chinese: 她刚来牧区的时候，生活上感到有点别扭。

sentences.english: In the dry farming and stockbreeding area, economy develops slowly, and farmers are bad- ly off.
sentences.chinese: 干旱农牧区经济发展缓慢，群众生活十分困难。

sentences.english: We will support more rapid development of pastoral areas and ethnic minority mountain regions.
sentences.chinese: 支持牧区和少数民族聚居山区加快发展。

sentences.english: Consequently traditional custom of hunting wolf has vanished as well in the region.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古牧区曾经的狩猎，捕狼的传统习俗也随之在消亡。

sentences.english: An estimated ninety percent of the meat eaten in East Africa comes from pastoralist herds.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，东非地区食用的的肉类90%来自牧区畜群。

sentences.english: Second, we must clear the government human capital investment in the rural pastoral functions of orientation.
sentences.chinese: 其次要明确政府在农村牧区人力资本投资的职能定位。

sentences.english: Farmers may want put up electric fences to enclose grazing areas, called paddocks.
sentences.chinese: 牧民们可能想把牧区用电网围起来，叫做围场。

sentences.english: From 1959, the pastoral areas practiced people's commune .
sentences.chinese: 1959年牧区全面实行了人民公社化。

sentences.english: Soil erosion is severe and the ecological environment is gradually deteriorating in the semi-agricultural and semi-pastoral area of Panxi.
sentences.chinese: 攀西半农半牧区水土流失严重，生态环境日趋恶化。

sentences.english: For more nomadic area of swimming.
